meta.name: Automatic Email Categorization & Labeling in Zoho Mail with GPT-4o-mini

name: AI-Powered Email Categorization & Labeling in Zoho Mail

categories.description:
Emails where customers ask for help, report problems, or request troubleshooting.
Examples:
“I can’t log into my account.”
“The app keeps crashing after the update.”
“How do I reset my password?”

Emails from potential customers showing interest in products or services. Usually contain inquiries, demo requests, or sales opportunities.
Examples:
“I’d like to learn more about your pricing plans.”
“Can we schedule a demo of your software?”
“We’re interested in purchasing licenses for our team.”

Emails about changes, updates, or management of existing accounts. Includes renewals, cancellations, and upgrades.
Examples:
“I’d like to upgrade my subscription plan.”
“Please cancel my account.”
“Can I change my billing address?”

Emails related to invoices, payments, refunds, receipts, and financial queries.
Examples:
“I haven’t received my invoice for July.”
“Can you send me a receipt for my last payment?”
“I’d like a refund for my subscription.”

Emails related to hiring, job applications, interviews, and employee management.
Examples:
“I’d like to apply for the marketing manager role.”
“Can we schedule an interview for next week?”
“We’re looking for candidates to fill open positions.”
This is related to emails which is not related to any of the above categories

parameters.content:
## Try It Out!

### This n8n template demonstrates how to use AI to automatically classify and organize incoming emails in **Zoho Mail** by applying the correct label (e.g., Support, Billing, HR, etc.).

Use cases include:

-   Automatically routing customer support requests to the right team.
    
-   Keeping billing and finance emails separate from general communication.
    
-   Streamlining HR and recruitment email handling.
    
-   Reducing inbox clutter and ensuring nothing important is missed.
    

----------

### How it works

-   The workflow is triggered whenever a new email arrives in Zoho Mail.
    
-   Zoho OAuth credentials are used to authenticate and fetch all available labels from your inbox.
    
-   A lookup map is created to match each label’s **display name → label ID**.
    
-   The AI model analyzes the email subject and body to predict the correct category.
    
-   Based on the classification, the workflow routes the email to the corresponding branch.
    
-   Finally, the correct Zoho Mail label is applied (node deactivated by default for safe testing).
    

----------

### How to use

-   Replace the **Zoho Mail Account ID** in the _Set Account ID_ node.
    
-   Configure your **Zoho OAuth credentials** in the _Get Access Token_ node.
    
-   Activate the **AI-Powered Email Categorization & Labeling in Zoho Mail** node once you are ready to run in production.
    
-   Test with sample emails to validate classification before enabling on your live inbox.
    

----------

### Requirements

-   Zoho Mail account with API access enabled.
    
-   Zoho OAuth credentials configured in n8n.
    
-   An AI model (via OpenRouter or other provider) for text classification.

I would like to upgrade my current subscription plan with [Product/Service Name]. Could you please share the available upgrade options, pricing details, and the process to switch plans?

If possible, Iâd also appreciate guidance on how the upgrade will affect my existing billing cycle and any pro-rated charges.

Looking forward to your assistance.

Best regards,

Ruthwik
